Class CRLPreferencesImpl

    CommonPreferences, CRLPreferences, Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,Object>

    public class CRLPreferencesImpl
extends CommonPreferencesImpl
implements CRLPreferences
    This class stores CRL Related preferences
